sentences.en: Do you think it would be dishonest if we went through his haversack?
sentences.cn: 斯佳丽,搜他的乾粮袋会不会不道德 呢 ?

sentences.en: He got my haversack from the cab and dumped it at my feet.
sentences.cn: 他把我的背包从出租车上取来丢到我脚下。

sentences.en: He put two bottles of wine and half a cheese into his haversack.
sentences.cn: 他把两瓶酒和半个干酪装在粮袋里.

sentences.en: Scarlett. Do you think it would be dishonest if we went through his haversack?
sentences.cn: 斯佳丽，如果我们搜他的干粮袋你会不会认为不道德呢？

sentences.en: You take the haversack, I'll search his pockets.
sentences.cn: 你把干粮袋捡起来，我来搜他的口袋。

trans.tran_en: a bag that you carry on your back
